ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] re: Class Balance
ygData.msgSnippet: I think it was fixed SEptember/October. It was a LONG time ago. But I can remember the complaints on Druid s Grove about it not working, people trying
ygData.messageBody:
I think it was fixed SEptember/October. It was a LONG time ago.
But I can remember the complaints on Druid's Grove about it not
working, people trying everything, and nothing seemed to
make the spell worth anything. Then, there were discussions -- with
GZ I think? and people started trying again. And suddenly it
was working. (Verant never said they fixed anything... but
some druids swore they had tried what eventually ended up being the
way to use the spell.)

Yes, that is a long time for him not to know.

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
>Sent: Monday, March 20, 2000 8:12 AM

>Really? I've been using harmony successfully for months. How
>could he fail
>to find out it worked for that long? when did it get fixed?
>
> Kit
